title: Falling from Gravity
description: If I hadn’t considered Amelia dangerous before, I certainly did now. She wasn’t anything like I had expected. Even after all these years—of living so close to her, of listening to her giggle with my sister in the bedroom next to mine—I hadn’t given much thought to my sister’s best friend.But in the span of one week, everything had changed.Everything.
author: K.K. Allen
